text: Corcelles is a former commune. It is found in the region Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes in the Ain department in the east of France. On 1 January 2016, it was merged into the new commune of Champdor-Corcelles.Arrêté préfectoral 27 November 2015 == References == Category:Former communes in Ain
title: Corcelles, Ain
